QuestData.Title: On the Wings of a Hippogryph
QuestData.Description: For a small fee, you can rent one of my hippogryphs to fly you to the Exodar.$B$BTaking the hippogryph is a faster, not to mention safer, alternative for someone carrying an important message. If you'd like to take a ride, speak to me again and I'll make the arrangements.
QuestData.LogDescription: Purchase a hippogryph ride to the Exodar from Zaldaan. When you land, take Chellan's List to Nurguni in the Seat of the Naaru at the Exodar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Greetings, friend. You look like you've come a long way. How can I help you?
QuestData.RewardText: So you've brought Chellan's list. Excellent! I was hoping to receive this today. Let's see what she needs.$B$B<Nurguni reads over the list and begins placing various items in a box.>$B$BThat's most of what she requested. The pieces for the beds are simply too large to be delivered by hippogryph, but I'll make arrangements to have them sent by wagon.
